榗字的基本解释

榗
jiàn
古书上说的一种树（一说是一种竹子）。

榗
jìn
古书上说的一种鼓。

榗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
树名。
[②]［jìn］
鼓名。

榗字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榗； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页543第09
【唐韻】子賤切，音箭。【說文】木也。《書》曰竹箭如榗。義未詳。　又【集韻】將先切，音箋。義同。　又【類篇】卽刃切，音晉。鼓名。○按《博雅》引《周禮》晉鼓，《鄭註》長六尺六寸。不从木。

榗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
榗字的起名意思

古书上说的一种鼓。还指古书上说的一种树（或竹子）。

榗
Basic explanation of words
榗
jiàn
A kind of tree (one kind of bamboo) mentioned in ancient books.
榗
jìn
A kind of drum said in ancient books.
榗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
Tree name.
[②]［jìn］
Drum name.
榗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榗; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 543 No. 09
[Tang Yun] The son is cheap and cut, and the arrow is sound. [Said the text] Mu Ye. "Book" said that bamboo arrows are like 榗. The meaning is unclear.　[Jiyun] will cut first, note. The same meaning.　[Classes] Cut with a blade, Yinjin. Drum name. ○According to "Boya" to quote "Zhou Li" as a drum, "Zheng's Note" is six feet and six inches long. Not from wood.
榗
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
榗
Name meaning
A kind of drum said in ancient books. It also refers to a kind of tree (or bamboo) mentioned in ancient books.
jiàn, jìn
